alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 10 at 2:40PM CST until November 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel will be nearly impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Mahnomen; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
